document.full_text: facebook began offering users in five u.s. cities coupons for everything from wine tastings to concert tickets on tuesday, turning up the competitive heat in an increasingly crowded market.
document.title: facebook jumps into crowded coupon market
lines_and_colors: facebook began offering users in five u.s. cities coupons for everything from wine tastings to concert tickets on tuesday, turning up the competitive heat in an increasingly crowded market.
